mdRecord.dcterms:title: Finals
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Harrison, Peggy, 1960-
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Retired UVa Spanish professor C. Julian Bishko, left, 93, made a point of attending UVa's graduation and Final Exercises to congratulate his cousin twice removed, Brandi L. Durkac, second from right. Bishko, who still goes to Alderman Library once a week to do research, became a mentor to Durkac, who majored in Spanish and economics. Standing with them are Spanish department chair David Gies, who said he also considered Bishko a mentor, and Brandi's mother, Lani, whose father was Bishko's first cousin.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
